Name: Hunter's Grand Caf√©
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, perfect for a beer in a smoking friendly environment.

Name: Hunter's Grand Caf√©
Review Text: Really cool place to have a smoke AND a beer! There's very few places in Amsterdam that do allow both. It's very big with lots of seating and TVs, the staff are friendly and helpful and its centrally located and easily accessible. Will definitely be going back and would reccomend to others

Name: Hunter's Grand Caf√©
Review Text: Great place for a drink, relaxing during the day and nice and warm inside for when it's cold out. Looks like it could get lively in the evenings with a large bar area and plenty of standing room

Name: Hunter's Grand Caf√©
Review Text: Nice place to smoke a joint AND drink a beer at the same time. This venue especially since they organize jam & listening sessions (music) several times a week.

Name: Hunter's Grand Caf√©
Review Text:
Got overcharged!

Ordered 2 teas, which should cost 2.40e each, was charged 6.80e on my card. Unfortunately I noticed only once I got home.
